author: LEWIS MWANIKI
text: He is loved genuinely by those that do. Happy birthday His Excellency #The5thAt55

author: LEWIS MWANIKI
text:
My Mashujaa Day message is borrowed from the renowned poem _The  Desiderata' by Max Ehrmann_ . And it reads:
 *Enjoy your achievements as well as your plans. Keep interested in your own career, however humble; it is a real possession in the changing Fortunes of Time.*

author: LEWIS MWANIKI
text: Quoting Henrik Ibsen's book 'An Enemy of the People'; "THE STRONGEST MAN IS HE WHO STANDS ALONE! That was DP Ruto in Bomas today. History never forgets, he is the man to watch.

author: LEWIS MWANIKI
text: Pressure grows on José Mourinho as Chelsea forget themselves at West Ham https://t.co/xqnOzYqmKM
